formattedAddress: 609 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 609 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: Nick has helped our family through multiple key real estate transactions, and we couldn't have asked for a better friend and professional through this. He served as both a listing and buyer agent for rental and sale transactions, and guided us through all the questions and concerns we had. Thankfully, this helped us find and create our dream home, as well as secure a property that we rented to responsible and kind tenants. We highly recommend Nick to anyone who is trying to navigate the NYC real estate market. Thank you Nick!

text.text: Nick has helped our family through multiple key real estate transactions, and we couldn't have asked for a better friend and professional through this. We highly recommend Nick to anyone who is trying to navigate the NYC real estate market. Thank you Nick!

originalText.text: Nick is a consummate professional that clearly has passion for his work. I was fortunate to meet Nick years ago when he was the sellers broker when i was purchased a condo, and we became friends instantly. He is genuine, fair, and omnipresent. He stands out among his peers due to his ability to make everyone feel comfortable trading money for value without focusing on the money, which everyone else seems to do. Im grateful to have him as a friend and recommend him highly to anyone looking for not only the best broker, but a good person that you can trust.

originalText.text:
Nicholas is one of the best realtors I’ve ever worked with.  We met him at an open house and he knew we were novices to the NYC real estate market.  He noted what we needed and found us something we’d never have found on our own online.  Also helped us with the entire coop board process spending hours preparing our application.  We could have never done it without him and those 7+ years we lived in Brooklyn heights were magical.

When it came time to sell, his team marketed it beautifully and the one day open house initiated a bidding war where we ended up over asking price.

originalText.text: It was a great pleasure to work with Nick Palance. With respect and patience, he guided us through the process of acquiring a property in NYC, while always keeping the light shined on where we stood and what our next step would be. Nick's attentiveness is certainly not limited to corresponding with clients, but is also visible on every other aspect from carefully organized schedule to neatly prepared documents. Very reliable and will always prioritize your needs whether big or small.

originalText.text: Nick?  Oh he’s The Best.  We entrusted Nick with selling our apt in the Hotel Des Artistes, and glad we did because, long-story-short that won him the Deal of the Year Award, as well as the cover image on the NYT real estate insert, his negotiation and writing skills can stand up to the fiercest real estate rodeo trenches.  It is no understatement to say that buying and selling can be an emotionally taxing ordeal, one that can make or break relationships; we remain good friends with Nick and like old teammates getting together, we talk about those old plays, smile and toast to them. Hire Nick.  He’s got what it takes.
